CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(LeadSource), "referral")), OR( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "New")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Working")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Unqualified")) ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "New")), OR( Hired_Another_Firm__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Disqualified_Reason__c, "Firm Availability"), ISPICKVAL(Disqualified_Reason__c, "Already Hired Another Firm") ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: SQL
